name: fun88_kok
description: 乐天堂和kok体育数据采集程序

scripts.pkgwin: rm bin/index.js && cp src/index.js bin/ && cd bin && pkg -t  win-x64 index.js -o main.exe && rm bin/index.js
scripts.pkgmac: rm bin/index.js && cp src/index.js bin/ && cd bin && pkg -t  mac index.js -o main && rm bin/index.js

author: 张伟
